REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the election by certain counties to withdraw from the metropolitan commuter transportation district; and permits the county of Putnam to make such election
Summary: Relates to the election by certain counties to withdraw from the metropolitan commuter transportation district; permits the county of Putnam to make such election.
LawCode: Amd ยง1279-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the election by certain counties to withdraw from the metropolitan commuter transportation district; and in relation to permitting the county of Putnam to make such election
